scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run copy-examples-folder-to-dist && parcel --target demo
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && parcel build --target floorplan --target examples --no-content-hash && npm run move-examples-module-to-docs
scripts.build:demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && npm run copy-examples-folder-to-dist && parcel build --target demo --no-content-hash
scripts.build:no-minify: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && parcel build --target floorplan --no-optimize
scripts.analyze: npm run clean && parcel build --target floorplan --target examples --reporter @parcel/reporter-bundle-analyzer
scripts.analyze:demo: npm run clean && parcel build --target demo --reporter @parcel/reporter-bundle-analyzer
scripts.update:docs: docker run -it --rm --volume=${PWD}/docs:/srv/jekyll -p 4000:4000 jekyll/jekyll bundle update github-pages
